HomePage.heroDescription: Melted wax sinking into the sea, billowing smoke rising from burning Troy, narcissus blooms on an ethereal reflection, the faded scent of rust lingers in the barren land.
HomePage.conceptDescription: Inspired by the traditional concept of ampoules—a small vessel preserving what remains of a life. What was the decisive moment in their story? What flashed before their eyes? What was the scent of that moment? From mythology's greatest tragedies to literature's most touching deaths.
HomePage.bottleDescription: Inspired by the shape of an ampoule, the cap evokes a candle flame. Each fragrance is a sample to their lives.

characters.icare: To escape from Crete, he flew with artificial wings. A beautiful impulse—the fierce wind and the warmth of the sun, filled him with ecstasy. He flew too close; the feathers and dripping wax fell with his life.
characters.cassandre: Born as the princess of Troy, she came into this world bearing both her gift and her curse. She foresaw the fall of Troy, yet Apollo's punishment made her unable to convince others of the coming tragedy.
characters.narcisse: His destiny was foretold at birth: he would lose his life to an unfulfillable love—his own reflection, a beautiful illusion. Only the fragrance of narcissus remains by the lakeside.
characters.antigone: Born into a house stained with curses, she watched her brothers slay each other. She held fast to what she believed was right, and buried the fallen with her own hands—even at the cost of her own life.

NavBar.banner: This website is for demonstration purposes only.

productDescriptions.cassandre: A floral scent on the ritual, Laurel and incense reveal the tragedy foreseen, Charred wood reveal the fall of Troy.
productDescriptions.narcisse: Narcissus perfume on still lake, Reeds bring the freshness of water, Plane tree is always there.
productDescriptions.icare: Sea water choked in the nose, the warmness of burning sun, Hot melting wax flowing on the skin.
productDescriptions.antigone: Rust and dust floating in the air, Myrrh permeates the forbidden burial, Incense smoke drifts from the sealed tomb.
